Anthony Vauss Jr.
-----------------

### Council Member At-Large

Municipal Building  
1 Civic Square
Irvington, New Jersey 07111

Main: 862-270-6341

Email: Councilmananthonyvaussjr@gmail.com

Biography of Anthony Vauss Jr. – Council Member at Large, Township of Irvington, New Jersey
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Anthony Vauss Jr.** is not just a name in the Township of Irvington; he embodies the very spirit of community and progress. As the son of Mayor Tony Vauss, Anthony has inherited a legacy of leadership and dedication to the residents of Irvington. Raised in this vibrant community, he has deep-rooted connections that fuel his passion for service and development.

With over eight years of experience as Chief of Staff to Mayor Tony Vauss, Anthony Vauss Jr. has gained invaluable insights into the workings of local government and the needs of the community. His tenure has equipped him with the skills necessary to advocate for the residents of Irvington effectively. His youthful energy and fresh perspective, combined with a profound understanding of the challenges the township faces, make him an exceptional leader.

In his recent campaign, which culminated in an overwhelming victory in the November 5, 2024, election, Anthony Vauss Jr. captured the hearts of the community with his vision for a brighter future. His commitment to improving the lives of his fellow residents is unwavering. Currently pursuing a degree in Organizational Leadership at Pillar College in Newark, NJ, he is driven by a desire to equip himself with the knowledge and skills necessary to be an effective advocate.

**Creating Affordable Housing**

Anthony Jr. believes that everyone deserves a place to call home. He is dedicated to implementing policies that promote the development of affordable housing in Irvington. His vision includes collaborating with developers to create inclusive housing options that cater to families of all backgrounds, ensuring that the township remains a welcoming environment for all its residents.

**Economic Development**

Understanding that a thriving economy is essential for the township’s growth, Anthony Vauss Jr. is committed to fostering economic development initiatives that create jobs and stimulate local businesses. He envisions a vibrant downtown district filled with diverse businesses, attracting visitors and providing residents with ample employment opportunities. By supporting local entrepreneurs and incentivizing new businesses, he aims to build a sustainable economic ecosystem that benefits everyone.

**Education and Youth Empowerment**

Anthony Jr. recognizes that the future of Irvington lies in its youth. He is passionate about enhancing educational opportunities and empowering young people to reach their full potential. Through partnerships with local schools and community organizations, he aims to provide mentorship programs, scholarships, and resources that inspire the next generation of leaders. His goal is to create an environment where every child has the opportunity to succeed, regardless of their background.

**Public Safety**

Safety is a fundamental right for every resident, and Anthony Vauss Jr. is committed to ensuring that Irvington remains a safe place to live and work. He plans to work collaboratively with law enforcement and community leaders to implement effective crime prevention strategies, enhance community policing efforts, and foster trust between residents and police. His approach emphasizes proactive measures that create safe neighborhoods and build a sense of security for all.

**Social Justice and Inequality**

In a world where social justice is more important than ever, Anthony Jr. stands firmly against inequality in all its forms. He is dedicated to advocating for policies that promote social equity and inclusion within the township. By engaging with marginalized communities, he aims to understand their needs and work towards creating a more just and equitable Irvington. His commitment to social justice reflects his core belief that every resident deserves a voice and the opportunity to thrive.

**Anthony Vauss Jr.** embodies the values of dedication, compassion, and resilience that have been instilled in him through his upbringing and experiences. He is not just a council member; he is a passionate advocate for the betterment of Irvington. With an unwavering promise to serve the community, Anthony Vauss Jr. is ready to roll up his sleeves and work tirelessly to fulfill the hopes and aspirations of his fellow residents. Together, under his leadership, Irvington can look forward to a future filled with promise, progress, and unity.
